data.product: Personalised Gift for Her, Personalised Candle, Simple Typography
data.description:
This apothecary style jar candle makes a wonderful gift for a friend, perfect for letting them know how much they mean to you. The subtle stone colored label is divided into five sections of text with a charcoal border, the main feature reads "To My Absolute Favourite". There is space for a personalised message of gratitude, a cute heart and gifting sign-off in the following sections. The last box shows the candle's scent of choice and burn time in a beautiful pairing of script and serif fonts. This candle is the perfect gift for your favourite friend!

The jar candle is presented in an apothecary style jar with lid and filled with a natural soy wax. Hand poured in our Manchester workshop, the candles are personalised to order before being beautifully packaged by hand with a choice of charming scents.

Two container sizes available:
Standard jar candle - 25 hour burn time | 140g approx.
Large brown jar candle - 40 hour burn time | 190g approx.

Create the perfect gifting experience with our range of little extras.

LUXURY GIFT WRAP
Elevate your gift's presentation with our signature Kindred Fires gift bag. Select 'this order is a gift' on the cart page and add gift wrapping to your order. We'll pack your goodies inside the bag ready for the recipient to open upon delivery.

WICK TRIMMER & SNUFFER SET
The perfect duo for candle lovers - our wick trimmer and snuffer set is crafted to help care for your candles, ensuring longevity and optimal burn.
https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/1661102691/wick-trimmer-and-snuffer-set-gift

BATH SALTS
Relax and unwind with our essential oil bath salts. A soothing mix of salts, natural oils and rose petals expertly blended and presented in a glass bottle with gold foiled label.
https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/1646926082/dead-sea-himalayan-bath-salts-essential

Candle scents to choose from:

TRANQUILITY
A calming, fresh scent reminiscent of relaxing spa days. This candle's aroma is light yet indulgent. Tranquility beautifully combines fresh citrus with eucalyptus on a clean floral base.

PASSIONFRUIT PALM
This enticing, uplifting fragrance radiates summer confidence. Passionfruit Palm is a complex blend of passionfruit and pineapple combined with a floral bouquet on a musky base.

BLACK VELVET
An indulgent, alluring scent that transports you to a night of adventure. Black Velvet combines exotic spices with an intense blend of jasmine and oud on a woody base.

SUNLIT ROSE
Drift through a charming English garden filled with the scent of the majestic rose. Distinctly feminine, Sunlit Rose is a heady combination of rose and violet on a bold base of amber and vanilla.

SECRET BEACH
An exotic escape, Secret Beach is reminiscent of a tropical ocean breeze. Fresh orange and soft peach rest on a creamy coconut and vanilla base. Close your eyes and let yourself drift to a place that's just yours.

PINK JASMINE
A sweet, feminine fragrance that creates a serene and joyful mood. Pink Jasmine has a bold base of amber and vanilla with sweet notes of pear, peach and jasmine.

SPICED ORCHARD
Inspired by the nostalgia of woodland walks and sugared treats, Spiced Orchard is a fragrance that celebrates all things Autumn. Brimming with warming spices, vanilla, and apple.

WINTER FOREST
Snow covered boots crunching on shimmering ground, surrounded by tall pine trees and icy skies. This is Winter Forest, a rich blend of alpine wood and balsam together with warming notes of cinnamon and clove.

FESTIVE SPICE
A spiced festive essential oil blend. Combining sweet orange extract, clove bud and cinnamon bark, Festive Spice evokes cosy memories of wood fires and mulled wine on dark winter's nights.

MOONLIT WONDER
All the glamour and luxury of a magical Winter's night are evoked by this rich, indulgent fragrance. Moonlit Wonder combines shimmering juniper with warm amber on a musky, patchouli base.

WANT TO SEE MORE GIFTS FOR HER?
Take a look at our gifts for her page here:
https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/KindredFires?section_id=28117500

CHECKOUT OUR NEW HOME FRAGRANCE SECTION:
https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/KindredFires?section_id=45470990

data.description:
Celebrate your first months of being a mum with our personalised book for new mothers.
The story is written on behalf of the baby, thanking Mum for all the wonderful things she does eg how she makes the baby laugh, places they visit, going to sleep etc.

PERSONALISING YOUR BOOK
- Select what you call Mum - Mummy, Mum, Mommy, Mom, Mammy, Mam, Mama, Ma
- Written on behalf of baby - enter child's (or children's) first name in personalisation field (max 30 characters)
- Tell us the amount of days since baby's birth - remember to do it from day you are giving book (eg Mother's Day) not from day of ordering.
- On the first page we print your gift message - enter this in NOTES TO SELLER at checkout. Only enter a message as everything you type here will be printed.
If you have any other questions - please contact us with a separate message.

For our full range of books with further personalisation, visit letterfest.com

24 pages, 210x250mm when flat (a little shorter than A4)

data.description:
Metal cufflinks with a diameter of 20 mm, square walnut gift box (1.8 × 1.8 × 1 inch). 
Add your personalization 
Please select the cufflinks and box and write the information you need to customize: 
for example- 
Cufflinks (A) J N
- Box Engraving (Style 1) M Monica
- You can also choose a different design for both cufflinks, for example - Cufflinks A+B
I will send you a mock-up via Etsy Inbox - you can modify it until you are satisfied
The design is customizable! If you would like to use your design, logo or handwriting, please send us your photo via Etsy message.
Engraving
Please view photos for design options or send us your design via Etsy message.
Box Options
Please select "Blank Box" for no customization, or "Engraved Box" for a personalized box.
Product ordering process.
1. Choose the style we give you or write your personalization (text, design style, font and special instructions) under the personalization box on the listing. You can also send your design (high resolution .jpeg or .png) via Etsy message. 
2.2. After we get your personalization, we will send you a design mock-up that can be modified according to your requirements, and we will create it only after you confirm it.
3. After the design mock-up is approved, we will produce and ship within 3-5 business days (except weekends).

data.description:
No wires or batteries are needed to power this speaker. Just place your phone in the slot and let the hand carved wood amplify the sound of your favorite music and podcasts.

This unique wood speaker will be an amazing addition to your home décor. It's actually the best gift (in our opinion) for every occasion.

data.description:
Our 100% Natural Cotton Macrame Pacifier clip is the perfect accessory for your little one. Measuring between 8.5-9.5 inches in length, this versatile clip can also be used to hold toys. The wooden clip is laser printed or engraved with your choice of wording and font, ensuring a personalized touch that will make this item even more special. Please remember to specify the exact wording and font style you desire when placing your order.

Please keep in mind that, due to the handmade nature of our products, there may be slight variations in texture, size, and appearance. As such, each clip is a unique work of art, crafted with careful attention to detail.

Please note that all of our items are made to order. If you require rush shipping, please contact us to discuss the possibility of expediting your order. We take great pride in creating each item to the highest possible standard and strive to deliver your order as quickly as possible.

We also wish to remind our customers that our pacifier clips should be spot cleaned only, as exposure to water can cause the metal clip to rust and the wood to swell. Please dry promptly in sunlight after cleaning.

Finally, we want to emphasize the importance of safety when using our products. Our pacifier clips are not toys and should never be used without supervision. They are not intended for chewing, and should be inspected before each use to ensure they are not damaged. Never use while your baby is unattended or sleeping. As the buyer, you assume all responsibility for the use of our products.

data.description:
When hung in a window, these beautiful suncatchers will catch the sunlight and create dazzling rainbows around your room.

- Ideal gift for birthdays, remembrance gifts, Christening gifts, Teacher gifts and much more
- The suncatchers will brighten up any home, yoga studio, workspace, classroom...
- Choose your message and fill it in in the custom box above
- All messages will be decorated with stars so please let me know if you would prefer yours without stars
- If you would like to include an image or if you would like a specific design layout please contact me and I will see what I can do
- Made in Ireland
- We dispatch orders in 1-2 working days

These hand-crafted crystal window creations are made from a variety of Irish woods, namely Beech and Oak.

- Crystal Angel = 20mm(3/4 inch) diameter Asfour crystal body with 2 x 14mm Asfour Crystal octagons, 2 x 18mm Asfour Crystal octagons and 10mm(1/4 inch) Asfour crystal head with Preciosa crown
- Crystal Sphere = 30mm(1 1/4 inch) diameter Asfour crystal
- Crystal Sun = 40mm (1 1/2 inch) diameter Asfour crystal
- Crystal Swarovski Sun = 40mm (1 1/2 inch) diameter Swarovski crystal disc

Wood Dimensions: Approx 130mm (5 inches) at its longest point.
Hanging string length: approx 300mm (12 inches) - please let us know if you would like this longer or shorter for your particular requirements.

This moon is our personalised medium size.
For our large versions please view my other listing here:
https://www.etsy.com/ie/listing/191502113/unique-personalized-gift-suncatcher-made?ref=shop_home_active_1&crt=1

We also offer moons without personalisation. You can see our full list of all our suncatchers here:
https://www.etsy.com/ie/shop/ArtwoodIreland?ref=seller-platform-mcnav

The above image is a sample. The characteristics of each piece of wood will vary slightly. We are very conscious of making sure that each and every piece is of equal natural beauty.

- Each piece is finished with danish oil to what we believe is the perfect sheen.
- It is hung with a high quality braided Dyneema fishing line which does not degrade in light like many other common threads. This line allows for exceptional free flowing spinning of the moon and the crystal within the moon.
- Wood is sourced locally in the west of Ireland
- They come carefully packaged in an environmentally responsible plastic-free gift box.
- We will gladly include a gift note for you so that the recipient knows who sent their special gift. Printed on recycled Kraft paper. An option for your gift note will come up in the checkout process.

Please note that these suncatchers are designed for indoor use and have not been tested outdoors.

data.description: Our personalized cufflinks are meticulously crafted for those who appreciate distinctive details. Made from premium quality 925 Sterling Silver and Durable Steel, they are designed to be durable and stylish. With an exclusive 2mm thickness, they offer superior durability and a unique design. Each pair of cufflinks is handmade, ensuring the highest level of quality. You can personalize your cufflinks with any engravings, including names, dates, locations, monograms, initials, or special messages, making them truly unique and meaningful. We offer three finishes to choose from: Sterling Silver, 18K Gold Filled, and Dark Grey (RHODIUM), allowing you to match the cufflinks to your personal style or occasion. Each set of cufflinks comes in a beautifully designed gift box, making it perfect for occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, or just a special treat for yourself.

data.description: Handmade design, contemporary artwork creation, unique light fixture gift, suitable for living room center & office by Noa Razer

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel.
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.
uniqueAttributes.Cultural heritage: On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.
uniqueAttributes.Research and innovation: The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

targetAudience.useCase: The product's unique design and cultural heritage make it a valuable addition to any art collection. It can be used as a statement piece in a living room, dining room, or office.

data.description: Handmade in Tel Aviv, this unique ceramic lamp combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green and orange-red. It measures 7.9 inches in height and diameter, and comes with a 60-inch golden textile cable and a terracotta ceiling rose. Suitable for standard E27 bulbs (25-40W max), it can be ordered in various colors and prints. This energy-efficient lamp is part of the Apilar collection, inspired by Spanish ceramics.
